author: ahmad3213
body:
#### PR description:

Nano AOD step added to Standard pLHE relvals 

runTheMatrix.py --what standard -l 1361.17, 1362.17, 1363.17,1361.18,1362.18,1363.18,1361.181,1370,1370.17, 1370.18

#### PR validation:

Tested by running locally following two relvals
runTheMatrix.py --what standard -l 1370, 1361.181 -t 8 -b 'fullsim_noPU_pLHE' --noCaf --wm init
title: Nano AOD step added for pLHE samples
